name: Pain Relief
description: Treat headache, muscle aches, and minor pains. Includes acetaminophen-based and NSAID options. Use as directed and avoid exceeding daily limits.

name: Antibiotics
description: Prescription medications used to treat bacterial infections. Always complete the full course as directed by your healthcare provider.

name: Vitamins
description: Daily supplements supporting overall wellness, immunity, and energy. Best taken with food for improved absorption.

name: Skincare
description: Creams and topicals for hydration, repair, and protection. For external use only; avoid contact with eyes.
